title: Side Effects of Black Cinema (with Desmond Thorne)
description:
This week, we delve into the deep canon of Black cinema with Desmond Thorne, film expert and host of Adventures in Black Cinema, the debut show on the Smart Funny and Black podcast network.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
